name: Bakeneko no Ko
description:
Description

You are a bakeneko - a demon cat - and you have found a human child in the land of the dead. Make choices and try to survive as you confront other yōkai on your journey. 

This is a collaborative Twine - a certain number of players need to complete the game in order to reveal the true ending. Work together with other players to lead the child to safety!

Credits

Concept, design, art: Hannah Chang

Design, client code, writing: Swati Mallya (swatimallya.com)

Client and server code: Jacob Oberman
